def_cn: 精炼的；去杂质的；提纯的
def_en: A refined substance has been made pure by having other substances removed from it.

def_cn: （人）有礼貌的，有教养的，彬彬有礼的，有品位的
def_en: If you say that someone is refined, you mean that they are very polite and have good manners and good taste.

def_cn: 经过完善的；经过提升的
def_en: If you describe a machine or a process as refined, you mean that it has been carefully developed and is therefore very efficient or elegant.
